valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 27 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected Fastnet 957 by midday tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 4 to 6, increasing 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In southwest, moderate or rough becoming rough or very rough later. in northeast, slight or moderate, becoming rough later in southwest.
Weather
In southwest, wintry showers. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
09:50 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026
Southeasterly gale force 8 expected later
